reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Innovating in the productive life of rural families

description.narrative: Promotion of better livelyhood and food production of poor and small farmer families in the Corrientes province through diversification of production adoption of environmentally friendly cultivation methods and joint sales activities. Includes e.g. trainin g technical support building of organizational skills and institutional capacity as well as enhancing the economic social and cultural role of rural women. The aim is to guarantee the livelyhood of the rural people in the area that has suffered from erosio n and degradation of the arable soil and removal of the young people for the lack of employment and sources of living.
